abstract: Russian Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin said the executives had undertaken to invest in power plants but were now trying to renege on the obligations.
snippet: Russian Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin said the executives had undertaken to invest in power plants but were now trying to renege on the obligations.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  Four of Russia’s wealthiest businessmen were criticized by Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin on Wednesday, accused of failing to properly invest in the country’s energy sector.

headline.main: Putin Questions Dealings of Russian Oligarchs
headline.print_headline: Putin Seeks Energy Investments From 4 Russian Tycoons
